participant_1.name: Max Carter
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and determined, he thrives on challenges and seeks out thrilling experiences.
participant_1.background: i am a stunt double as my second job. i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life.

participant_2.name: Sophie Bennett
participant_2.personality: Creative and playful, she enjoys expressing herself through her fashion choices and has a vibrant personality.
participant_2.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games.

content.text: i am not sure what that is . i am not a very experienced person .
